metadata.title: CVE-2024-27026 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:vmxnet3: Fix missing reserved tailroom Use rbi->len instead of rcd->len fornon-dataring packet. Found issue: XDP_WARN:xdp_update_frame_from_buff(line:278): Driver BUG: missing reserved tailroomWARNING: CPU: 0 PID: 0 at net/core/xdp.c:586 xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 CPU: 0 PID:0 Comm: swapper/0 Tainted: G W O 6.5.1 #1 RIP: 0010:xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 ... ?xdp_warn+0xf/0x20 xdp_do_redirect+0x15f/0x1c0 vmxnet3_run_xdp+0x17a/0x400[vmxnet3] vmxnet3_process_xdp+0xe4/0x760 [vmxnet3] ?vmxnet3_tq_tx_complete.isra.0+0x21e/0x2c0 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_rq_rx_complete+0x7ad/0x1120 [vmxnet3]vmxnet3_poll_rx_only+0x2d/0xa0 [vmxnet3] __napi_poll+0x20/0x180net_rx_action+0x177/0x390

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-27026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic - 6.8.0-35.35
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-generic-64k - 6.8.0-35.35
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1009-aws - 6.8.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-azure - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-gcp - 6.8.0-1008.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1004-gke - 6.8.0-1004.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-ibm - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency - 6.8.0-35.35.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-35-lowlatency-64k - 6.8.0-35.35.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oracle - 6.8.0-1006.6
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oracle-64k - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.8.0-1005-raspi - 6.8.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1006-oem - 6.8.0-1006.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1005.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-35.35').
linux-aws package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1009.9').
linux-azure package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1008.8').
linux-gcp package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1008.9').
linux-gke package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1004.7').
linux-ibm package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.6').
linux-lowlatency package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-35.35.1').
linux-oracle package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.6').
linux-raspi package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1005.5').
linux-oem-6.8 package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1006.6').
linux-intel package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.8.0-1005.12').
linux-raspi-realtime package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-2004.4').
linux-realtime package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.1-1002.2').
